  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener, PaintSession, PaintTool, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener

    public class RectangleTool
extends DragPaintSession
implements PaintTool
    A drawing tool.
